titles.title: John saw the multitude of the overcomers

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
John saw the multitude of the overcomers
All of them were worshiping the Lord
Some of them were singing
Some of them were shouting
But all of them were worshiping the Lord

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Oh praise the Lord (x2)
Singing glory, hallelujah, praise the Lord
Hallelujah (x5), praise the Lord
Hallelujah (x5), praise the Lord
